rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ARC2401, IAR2411}
Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}

description: This unit provides an overview of approaches to the history and theory of interior architecture. The unit will also introduce methods for the written and visual analysis of interior architecture. The unit will investigate dialogues between history, theory and interior architectural design.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
